column1: In Jared's version of The Three Little Pigs, the wolf shows up at the brick house with a sheriff and an eviction notice. @cspanwj Jared Kushner Calls Coronavirus Response ‘a Great Success Story’ as Death Toll Nears 60,000 https://www.thedailybeast.com/jared-kushner-calls-coronavirus-response-a-great-success-story-as-death-toll-nears-60000?source=twitter&via=desktop via @thedailybeast
